QuestData.Title: Scouting the Palace
QuestData.Description: We cannot hide here forever, $n. Azshara must be dealt with.$b$bIt would be an act of folly to assault her palace without knowing what defenses she has in place. I dispatched a scouting team while you were gone, but they have not reported back.$b$bI'm getting concerned, $n. Let me know when you're ready and I'll perform a ritual to see what has happened to our scouts.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Lady Jaina Proudmoore to observe the scouting party.
